file_content.text: You're here. You found me.
I always will, cyar'ika. I love you.
[Flirt] Nothing keeps us apart.
Vette?
Vette, do you copy? We're coming for you next.
I found your little Twi'lek. Now she's all mine.
Leave Vette alone. Your fight is with me.
Don't hurt her.
At least we agree on something.
Tell me where, and I'll find you. Just let Vette go.
Free Vette first.
That isn't how this works.
I said I'd find you, Torian. I don't break promises to my friends.
Of course I did.
I would have been here sooner, but Vaylin kept throwing troops in the way.
Sorry it took so long.
Nobody is strong enough to stop me. Remember that.
Did you expect me to fail?
You make it hard to forget.
I hold you in my heart forever.
That's one of the reasons I follow you.
Bad luck for them.
You think holding her hostage is going to stop me from coming after you?
This changes nothing.
No, I'm hoping it will bring you to me.
You got what you wanted. I'm on Odessen. Now let's end this.
You've got my attention.
What do you want?
Good. That was the point.
I've been waiting far too long to kill you.
I thought you'd never ask.
You don't have the guts to face me in a fair fight.
This is a trick.
So eager! I've broken Father's chains, and now I'm going to break you!
I'm sending you a location. We meet there.
I've broken Father's chains. This fight will be anything but fair.
Wrong again, Outlander.
When the Outlander faces you, both Arcann and I will be at her side.
When the Outlander faces you, both Arcann and I will be at his side.
I'm counting on it, Mother.
Vette needs us. Let's move.
I'd just slow you down. I'll wait here. Drive Vaylin and her troops off our world.
